title: Market for clinkers at specific price

content.question: Based on the provided graph of the market for clinkers, which of the following statements is true if the current price in the market for clinkers is $20?

choices.label: There is a shortage of 2 clinkers.
There is a surplus of 2 clinkers.
The demand for clinkers will decrease.
The supply of clinkers will increase.

content.answer: There is a surplus of 2 clinkers.

topic.text: 1.6: Market Equilibrium, Disequilibrium, and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
